metadata.Title: CVE-2022-48425 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In the Linux kernel through 6.2.7, fs/ntfs3/inode.c has an invalid kfreebecause it does not validate MFT flags before replaying logs.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
